name: TextTest
description: Unit tests for the Text class in the net.datafaker.providers.base package.

test_cases.name: textShouldContain3RULowerCaseAnd5CustomSpecialSymbols
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated text contains exactly 3 Russian lowercase letters and 5 custom special symbols.

test_cases.name: exceptionIfLengthIsShorterThanNumberOfRequiredSymbols
test_cases.description: Tests that an IllegalArgumentException is thrown when the length of the text is shorter than the number of required symbols.

test_cases.name: everyTextShouldContainLowerCaseUpperCaseAndDigit
test_cases.description: Tests that every generated text contains at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one digit.

test_cases.name: testCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated character is an alphabetic character.

test_cases.name: testUppercaseCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated character is an uppercase character.

test_cases.name: testLowercaseCharacter
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated character is a lowercase character.

test_cases.name: testFixedLengthText
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated text has a fixed length specified by the input parameter.

test_cases.name: testDefaultLengthText
test_cases.description: Tests that the generated text has a length between 20 and 80 characters.
